ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Talies - an update
ygData.msgSnippet: ???  did they change it recently?  I was able to do the bone chip quest in Kaladim while at Indifferent.  The talon quest did require more faction, but after
ygData.messageBody:
??? did they change it recently? I was able to do the bone chip quest in
Kaladim while at Indifferent. The talon quest did require more faction, but
after turning in bone chips that was not an issue.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: Tuesday, 29 May, 2001 8:55 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Talies - an update


At 01:40 AM 5/30/01 -0200, you wrote:
>Good job. Save those bone chips at lower lvls there is a wonderful faction
>building quest that gives very nice exp until around lvl 10 or so. Its in
>Kaladim back by the paladin guild. I forget the guys name off hand right
>now. Good luck.


Unfortunately, that quest requires even MORE faction to start than the
newbie quests in Ak'anon! I've tried before :P It's worth more just to
sell it to Necros...


Talies the Wanderer
